revised_title: Spinor Equations in General Relativity: A Non-Commutative Newman-Penrose Formalism
tldr: The authors present a new non-commutative Newman-Penrose formalism for solving spinor equations in general relativity. They introduce a specialized version of the formalism and explain the concept of exact sets of spinor fields. The formalism is applied to the spin-2 equation for the Weyl spinor in vacuum general relativity, providing a method to compute higher terms in the Taylor series expansion of the Weyl spinor.
